程序包 com.academic_assistant.service

类 CourseService

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.service.CourseService
@Service public class CourseService extends Object
This class provides services related to courses such as retrieving courses, enrolling, exiting, editing, and deleting courses, as well as searching for courses and providing course recommendations.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    CourseService(UserRepository userRepository, CourseRepository courseRepository)
    Constructs a new CourseService with the specified UserRepository and CourseRepository.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CourseService

      @Autowired public CourseService(UserRepository userRepository, CourseRepository courseRepository)
      Constructs a new CourseService with the specified UserRepository and CourseRepository.
      参数:
      userRepository - The UserRepository to be used by the service.
      courseRepository - The CourseRepository to be used by the service.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getAllCourses

      public List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> getAllCourses()
      Retrieves all courses available in the system.
      返回:
      A list of JSONObjects representing all courses.

    • getCourseById

      public Optional<Course> getCourseById(Integer id)
      Retrieves a course by its ID.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the course.
      返回:
      An Optional containing the course, or empty if not found.

    • getPlanCourses

      public List<Course> getPlanCourses()
      Retrieves courses categorized as part of the curriculum plan.
      返回:
      A list of Course objects representing plan courses.

    • getNonPlanCourses

      public List<Course> getNonPlanCourses()
      Retrieves courses categorized as non-curriculum plan courses.
      返回:
      A list of Course objects representing non-plan courses.

    • editCourse

      public boolean editCourse(String jsonString)
      Edits the details of a course based on the provided JSON string.
      参数:
      jsonString - A JSON string containing the updated course details.
      返回:
      true if the course is successfully edited, otherwise false.

    • deleteCourse

      public boolean deleteCourse(String jsonString)
      Deletes a course based on the provided JSON string.
      参数:
      jsonString - A JSON string containing the ID of the course to be deleted.
      返回:
      true if the course is successfully deleted, otherwise false.

    • getAllCoursesJson

      public String getAllCoursesJson()
      Retrieves all courses in JSON format.
      返回:
      A JSON string representing all courses.

    • getCoursesByStudentID

      public List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> getCoursesByStudentID(String jsonString)
      Retrieves courses associated with a specific student ID.
      参数:
      jsonString - A JSON string containing the student ID.
      返回:
      A list of JSONObjects representing courses associated with the student ID.

    • getCoursesBySearch

      public List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> getCoursesBySearch(String jsonString)
      Retrieves courses based on search criteria provided in a JSON string.
      参数:
      jsonString - A JSON string containing the search criteria.
      返回:
      A list of JSONObjects representing filtered courses.

    • getSelectableCourses

      public List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> getSelectableCourses(String jsonString)
      Retrieves selectable courses for a specific student based on their ID.
      参数:
      jsonString - A JSON string containing the student ID.
      返回:
      A list of JSONObjects representing selectable courses.

    • enrollCourse

      public String enrollCourse(int courseId, int userId)
      Enrolls a student in a course.
      参数:
      courseId - The ID of the course to enroll in.
      userId - The ID of the user to enroll.
      返回:
      A string indicating the result of the enrollment process.

    • exitCourse

      public String exitCourse(int courseId, int userId)
      Allows a student to exit from a course.
      参数:
      courseId - The ID of the course to exit from.
      userId - The ID of the user to exit.
      返回:
      A string indicating the result of the exit process.

    • checkConflict

      public static boolean checkConflict(List<int[][][][]> a, List<int[][][][]> b)
      Checks for time conflicts between courses.
      参数:
      a - List of course schedules.
      b - List of course schedules.
      返回:
      true if there is a time conflict, otherwise false.

    • getCourseList

      public List<int[][][][]> getCourseList(com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject information)
      Retrieves the schedule of a course as a list of multi-dimensional arrays.
      参数:
      information - JSONObject containing course schedule information.
      返回:
      A list of multi-dimensional arrays representing the course schedule.

    • getCourseArray

      public int[][][][] getCourseArray(com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONArray itemList)
      Converts a JSONArray into a multi-dimensional array representing course schedules.
      参数:
      itemList - JSONArray containing course schedule information.
      返回:
      A multi-dimensional array representing the course schedule.

    • weeks

      public int[] weeks(String s)
      Parses a string representing weeks and returns an array indicating weeks present.
      参数:
      s - String representing weeks.
      返回:
      An array indicating weeks present.

    • addEvaluation

      public String addEvaluation(com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject request)
      Adds an evaluation for a course.
      参数:
      request - JSONObject containing evaluation details.
      返回:
      A string indicating the result of the evaluation process.

    • getRecommendation

      public List<com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject> getRecommendation(String request)
      Retrieves course recommendations based on student's grades and courses taken.
      参数:
      request - JSON string containing student's grades and courses taken.
      返回:
      A list of JSONObjects representing recommended courses.
